item.title: Log Analytics: How To Turn Log Data into Actionable Insights
item.description: Breaking news: Log data can provide a ton of value, if you know how to do it right. Read on to get everything you need to know to maximize value from logs.

item.title: ICT-ISAC's Women in Security SiG Visits Splunk's Former Office: A Vibrant Exchange Among Female Security Professionals
item.description: Splunk Japan joined ICT-ISAC. We had the pleasure of hosting 23 members of Sekijo-SiG at Splunk Japan's former office.

item.title: Executive Q&A: Accelerating AI Success with Splunk and AWS

item.title: Accelerate Operations with AI: New Splunk and AWS Integrations
item.description: Two new integrations with AWS have created seamless workflows that activate your Splunk data where it lives, removing friction and accelerating time-to-value.
